Metadaten.description: We design, produce and assemble machines, handling units and crane systems for all kinds of transport tasks! Our team has more than 25 years of experience in custom engineering, challenge us!

Menus.Zum_Drehen:
For turning, tilting and/or
turn-over of sheet metal,
flat glass, bended panes,
wooden plates, etc.
Different other objects can be moved savely by using our individual gripping systems!
Menus.Hubeinrichtung_500: up to 600 kg with pneumatic hoisting tube
Menus.Hubeinrichtung_1500: up to 1500 kg with electric hoisting tube
Menus.Hallenkraene: Lifters for mounting in an overhead-crane
Menus.Akkulifte: Accumulator driven suction frames for outdoor use
Menus.Unsere_Lifte:
Our lifters are ready for mounting in an
existing craneway.
Of course you can also order your individual lightweight craneway together with your lifter.
We’ll be happy to advise you.
Menus.Ueberkranungen:
Lightweight craneways (e. g. Abus-systems),
with one or two double rail bridges, traction drive
as option, on pillars and/or consoles or hanged
from the factory roof.
Menus.Saeulen: Slewing cranes for pillar or wall mounting with jib length up to 7,5 m
Menus.Kransysteme:
We also offer you for your existing cranes, handling devices and also
laminating lines:
Menus.Pruefung:
We carry out safety checking
for cranes and lifting devices
according to accident prevention
regulations.
BGG 905/ZH 1/27
